name: Manos Watcher 1966
description:
This game is part of series wherein I make one prototype per week based on a theme.

Prototype Week #11: Make a game with the theme of 'boredom'.  

Manos Watcher 1966.  A game about trying to stay awake while watching one of the worst movies ever made.  Contrary to the the theme, the small amount of interaction probably makes the movie MORE watchable.
